 00:04 Good morning, everyone, and thank you for participating in today's conference call to discuss Reservoir Media's Financial Results for the Third Quarter of Fiscal 2022 ended December 31, 2021. Revenue for the third fiscal quarter was $27.1 million, which represented a 26% increase from the third quarter of fiscal 2021. Music Publishing generated revenue of $18.4 million in the quarter, which was a 4% improvement from this time last year. 10:33 Synchronization revenue in the publishing segment totaled $2.4 million, representing a 79% increase from the third quarter last year, largely due to the recovery in the film and television industry from the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic. 10:58 Our Recorded Music segment had another quarter of strong results, generating $8.1 million in revenue in the third quarter, which is up 147% from the prior year quarter. All revenue types within our Recorded Music segment delivered solid results, led by digital revenue, which, as mentioned, saw a 217% increase and that was driven by the continued growth and consumption of music streaming services. 12:48 For the quarter OIBDA increased 11% year-over-year to $9 million, while adjusted EBITDA grew 26% to $10.2 million from the third quarter of fiscal 2021.
